SCENARIOS.main_dialog_piece: A guy walks up and offers some beans. Do you take them?
A survivor knocks on your door. They say they're wounded. Do you let them in?

Yes.MSG: They eat your food and leave.

SCENARIOS.main_dialog_piece: Intruders violently hit your door. They demand food and water. What will you do?

Give them what they want.MSG: You give them your valueable resources and they leave
